name: Print Array
author: Justin Thomas for Bailey Brand Consulting

sections.description: This plugin allows the use of the function echo_array to print out array data within a custom template, most often used for debugging complex code. Within the ‘Settings’ in the WordPress admin, you can set font face, size, and color so as to easily distinguish debugging information from regular content.
sections.installation:
1. Upload print-array folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Site wide Settings are located in “Settings”, “Print Array”.
sections.faq: Once people start asking questions, I’ll add them!
sections.changelog:
0.1

  • First version, basic functionality

0.2

  • Streamlined code, removed unnecessary code comments
